review: Heard this place opened up near campus so I was excited to check it out and it did not disappoint. Super convenient location and totally worth the price. The staff is very friendly and the place itself has a cute & comfortable vibe. My friend and I got the boba and the meat & vegetarian banh mi and they were really good! boba was a bit sweet for me but other than that a new go-to spot
name: Butterfly

review: This is the best place for Bubble Tea , Juices and Smoothies . Very tasty . Nice atmosphere , so welcoming , absolutely outstanding customer service . Great place for family, kids and friends.The lemon tea with boba was great as well Vietnamese sandwich . Must visit and try .
name: Butterfly
